publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1229# Mr Jamie McGrigor: Competitive School Sport-That the Parliament congratulates Johnstone High School and the Nicholson Institute for being finalists in the 101st Bank of Scotland Senior Shield Final; applauds the commitment and determination they showed in reaching the final; recognises the importance of having young sportsmen and women competing at the highest possible levels of competition, given the current state of many of our major sports, and considers that the Scottish Executive should ensure that school sport is made a priority so that children are able to enjoy competitive sport at the highest levels and that more time is given in the curriculum to sport in general in Scotland's schools. Supported by: Murdo Fraser*
